title: New: Rosie Carney – Winter
body:
Donegal songwriter **Rosie Carney** is one of my favourite voices of the past few years, both in her tone and the personality and character that she instills in her delicately composed tracks.

Her latest, _Winter_, is another sparklingly mature number, real heart-on-sleeve stuff, that manages to feels simultaneously raw with emotion yet resoundingly polished. Check it out below.
